vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(P'al) to crush, break, shatter
Aramaic of ra.a (רָעַע "to shatter" H7489B)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   romper, quebrar; (b)   ser malo, malvado; (c) nif.   ser lastimado, sufrir heridas; (d) hitp.   ser quebrado; (e) hif.   hacer el mal; (f) hif.   participio: malvado
vocabInfos._stepDetailLexicalTag: [["meaning","H7489B","to shatter",8,"רָעַע"],["in the form","H7465","to shatter",1,"רֹעָה"],["in Aramaic","H7490","to break",2,"רְעַע"]]
